scripts.pack:win64: electron-packager . SchuBot --out=./dist --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --electronVersion=9.0.4 --asar --prune --overwrite --version-string.ProductName="SchuBot" --icon=./gui/images/cocoabot.ico --ignore=/user-settings --ignore=/resources --ignore=/.vscode && xcopy /s /i /Y resources\jsondbfiles .\dist\SchuBot-win32-x64\resources\jsondbfiles && xcopy /s /i /Y resources\media .\dist\SchuBot-win32-x64\resources\media
scripts.pack:mac: electron-packager . SchuBot --out=./dist --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --electronVersion=9.0.4 --asar --prune --overwrite --version-string.ProductName="SchuBot" --icon=./gui/images/cocoabot.icns --ignore=/user-settings --ignore=/resources --ignore=/.vscode && mkdir -p ./dist/SchuBot-darwin-x64/resources/jsondbfiles && cp -a ./resources/jsondbfiles/. ./dist/SchuBot-darwin-x64/resources/jsondbfiles/ && mkdir -p ./dist/SchuBot-darwin-x64/resources/media && cp -a ./resources/media/. ./dist/SchuBot-darwin-x64/resources/media/
scripts.build-all: echo Packaging 32bit versions && npm run rebuild32 && npm run pack:all32 && echo 32bit Packaging done.... && echo Packaging 64bit versions && npm run rebuild64 && npm run pack:all64
scripts.package: echo Building Electron package && npm run pack:win64 && echo Packing the installer && grunt create-windows-installer && echo Installer package ready!
